html.p: The following algorithm will always work to reduce a matrix into Row-Reduced Echelon Form.

li.p: If necessary, swap two rows to get the left-most remaining non-zero entry to the topmost row that has not yet been set.
If necessary, scale that row to make its leading entry a 1.
Clear all non-zero entries in the column of that pivot (both above and below the pivot) by adding/subtracting multiples of that row to/from other rows.
With that pivot now set, repeat the procedure with the remaining rows.
